parsing_result:
# Software for Use with Your Camera

The camera can be used with the following software. For the latest information on software available from Fujifilm, visit Fujifilm Support.

## FUJIFILM Camera Remote

Establish a wireless connection between your camera and a smartphone or tablet (page 284).  
http://app.fujifilm-dsc.com/en/camera_remote/

## FUJIFILM PC AutoSave

Download pictures from your camera over wireless networks (page 286).  
http://app.fujifilm-dsc.com/en/pc_autosave/

## RAW FILE CONVERTER EX powered by SILKYPIX

RAW FILE CONVERTER EX powered by SILKYPIX is RAW conversion software from Ichikawa Soft Laboratory Co., Ltd. View RAW pictures on your computer and convert them into other formats. RAW FILE CONVERTER EX powered by SILKYPIX is available free of charge from the Fujifilm website.  
https://fujifilm-x.com/support/download/software/raw-file-converter-ex-powered-by-silkypix/

> "RAW FILE CONVERTER EX powered by SILKYPIX" is supplied by Ichikawa Soft Laboratory Co., Ltd.

## Capture One Express Fujifilm

Capture One Express Fujifilm is image edit software from Capture One A/S. View RAW pictures on your computer and convert them into other formats. Capture One Express Fujifilm is available free of charge from Capture One A/S.  
https://www.captureone.com/products-plans/capture-one-express/fujifilm

> Visit the Capture One A/S website for the latest support information.

subsection: RAW FILE CONVERTER EX powered by SILKYPIX
